Intro.Zikri Ramdani:
Hello! My name is Zikri Ramdani, and I am a Web Developer with over 5 years of experience in web development. I am passionate about creating innovative and user-friendly web solutions, as well as skilled in modern technologies to build efficient and high-performance applications.

Goal:
I am committed to continuously learning and growing in technology, innovating, and delivering creative and effective web solutions. I also strive to stay updated with the latest industry trends and apply best practices in every project.

I am very enthusiastic about bringing my expertise and experience to your team and look forward to contributing to the success of your projects. Thank you for your attention!

Education.STMIK PGRI TANGERANG:
STMIK PGRI TANGERANG is a computer education institution under the auspices of the PGRI Higher Education Foundation. The foundation carries out the noble mandate contained in the Preamble of the 1945 Constitution,which is the mission to educate the lives of the Indonesian people.
